name: Arise Educational Center
description: ARISE is a non-public school that specializes in working with at-risk children who have been identified in need of psycho-educational therapeutic intervention. They offer family therapy, group therapy and one-on-one counseling with a specialized activity-oriented treatment program.
fullDescription: ARISE is a non-public school that specializes in working with at-risk children who have been identified in need of psycho-educational therapeutic intervention. They offer family therapy, group therapy and one-on-one counseling with a specialized activity-oriented treatment program.

address: 1760 Cesar Chavez Street., San Francisco, CA, 94124-1136
